column1: Working hard for better labor standards strengthened election security improved access to affordable housing reducing the effects of climate change gender equity and more. Let's continue fighting together 🙌 https://t.co/LmSuWpMWCx #VoteforDavidScott https://t.co/HD68Bg3iQR

Congressman Scott has been proudly serving Georgia's #District13 for 16 years. He's committed to improving the lives of his constituents by securing jobs and providing health care resources. Support him by contributing to his campaign 👉 https://t.co/qy2qOflAO8 https://t.co/ArKNw5wHcL

The College Affordability Act would increase financial aid awards to lower-income students provide funding and support to minority-serving institutions ensure homeless and hungry students are fed and housed and so much more. #DavidScottforCongress  ℹ️ https://t.co/LmSuWpMWCx https://t.co/DDOoprgZet

I was proud to vote for the Lower Drug Costs Now Act.
